selected_quotes: There's a need to deliberately push the pendulum back toward process-of-care measures to facilitate meaningful QI
More focus on processes of care
Outcomes measures may be misleading-may need to use process measures for quality improvement #ACSCC15
Outcomes measures may be misleading-may need to use process Measures for quality improvement @JAMA_curr…

facebook.title: Process Measures and Quality Improvement
facebook.summary: For real? Expert in @JAMA_current recommends embracing process measures over outcome measures. http://t.co/zwSqn1bjwQ cc @ashishkjha

A balanced approach to measurement is needed that includes all domains of quality, but there is a need to deliberately push the pendulum back toward process-of-care measures to facilitate meaningful quality improvement (QI) efforts. http://ja.ma/1O6LOPb
